#summary Example XML stub format for modules:

{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?>
<module>
<version>2.0</version>
<type>commands</type>
<name>Operator Panel</name>
<purchase>US$40.00</purchase>
<credits>http://www.fop2.com</credits>
<description>A console you can use to monitor and control calls</description>
<icon>blue_button</icon>

<allow_multiple>false</allow_multiple>

<menu>
<item>
<link>panel/</link>
<use_iframe>1</use_iframe>
<text>
<en>Operator Panel</en>
<it>Operator Panel</it>
</text>
<security_level>1</security_level>
</item>
</menu>

<configure>

<run>pangen.php</run>
</configure>
<install>
<command>/usr/bin/wget http://asternic.org/files/op_panel-0.29.tar.gz</command>
<command>tar -zxvf op_panel-0.29.tar.gz</command>
<command>mkdir panel/</command>
<command>cp op_panel-0.29/* /panel</command>
<command>mkdir /var/www/panel/</command>
<command>cp op_panel-0.29/flash/* /var/www/panel/</command>
<command>cp /var/www/install/init.d/panel /etc/init.d/</command>
<command>chmod +x /etc/init.d/panel</command>
<command>update-rc.d panel defaults</command>
<command>rm -rf op_panel-0.29</command>
<command>rm -f op_panel-0.29.tar.gz</command>
</install>
<uninstall>
<command>rm -rf /panel</command>
<command>rm -rf /var/www/panel</command>
<command>update-rc.d panel remove</command>
<command>rm /etc/init.d/panel</command>
</uninstall>
</module>
}}}
